43.last_action: Committee recommended measure be held for further study
43.title: Relating To Education
43.description: Promotes healthy school buildings and grounds by prohibiting the use of certain appliances in school buildings.

400.last_action: Committee recommended measure be held for further study
400.title: Licensing Of Health Care Facilities
400.description: Mandates a patient shall not be denied appropriate care on the basis of age/sex/gender identity/sexual orientation, race/color/marital status/familial status/disability/religion/national origin/source of income/source of payment or profession.

1005.last_action: Committee recommended Substitute A be held for further study
1005.title: Sentence Or Execution
1005.description: Amends Hate Crimes Sentencing Act. Adds gender identity, expression to protected groups. Clarifies sentencing enhancements for hate crimes against victims in a protected group. Permits sentencing to community service or educational classes.
